org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support

Packages that use org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support
Package
Description
org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support
Support package for MVC controllers.
  • Classes in org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support used by org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support
    Class
    Description
    RedirectAttributes
    A specialization of the Model interface that controllers can use to select attributes for a redirect scenario.
    RedirectAttributesModelMap
    A ModelMap implementation of RedirectAttributes that formats values as Strings using a DataBinder.
